sentences.en: A balanced diet is an insurance against malnutrition.
sentences.cn: 均衡的食谱是防止营养不良的保证.
饥荒不同于慢性营养不良.

sentences.en: Forty per cent of the population is suffering from malnutrition.
sentences.cn: 人口中有40%的人营养不良。
他的病是营养不良引起的.

sentences.en: Infections are more likely in those suffering from malnutrition.
sentences.cn: 营养不良的人更有可能被传染。

sentences.en: International Digest: How we would assess severity of protein energy malnutrition?
sentences.cn: 《国际肝病》: 我们如何评估蛋白质能量营养不良的严重程度?

sentences.en: It is a classic case of malnutrition.
sentences.cn: 这是营养不良的典型病例.
营养不良明显导致病人身体虚弱。

sentences.en: Master the differentiation , diagnosis and cautions of Infantile Enuresis and Infantile Malnutrition.
sentences.cn: 掌握遗尿、疳积的鉴别诊断、注意事项.

sentences.en: Progress in the battle against malnutrition and proverty can be sustained if satisfactory economic growth.
sentences.cn: 如果实现令人满意的经济增长,而且只有实现令人满意的经济增长在减轻营养不良和贫困方面取得的进展才能持久.

sentences.en: Protein malnutrition may result in a number of other adverse effect.
sentences.cn: 蛋白质营养不良,可引起许多其它不良影响.

sentences.en: She says children are at risk of severe and acute malnutrition.
sentences.cn: 她说那里的孩子们有患上严重的急性营养不良的风险.

sentences.en: The symptoms of lead poisoning are much like those of malnutrition.
sentences.cn: 铅中毒的症状和营养不良极为相似.

sentences.en: Their bodies had suffered contortion as a result of malnutrition.
sentences.cn: 由于营养不良他们的躯体都变了形。

sentences.en: Their hardships were appalling and many died of disease and malnutrition.
sentences.cn: 他们遇到的困难令人震惊,许多船员死于疾病和营养不良.

words.tran_cn: 营养不良的；营养失调的

trans.tran_en: when someone becomes ill or weak because they have not eaten enough good food
